name: remonetize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change something that is no longer recognized as money back into money: Investors find gold attractive because it can easily be remonetized. There was a plan to remonetize silver and increase its circulation.
to make money from something again: The record companies are wondering how they might remonetize their artists. Streaming sites enable musicians to remonetize their material. Related words
monetize
remonetization
More examplesFewer examplesThey argued that gold should be remonetised as an international medium of exchange.The committee was in favour of remonetizing precious metals.In 1878 Congress passed a bill to remonetize silver.
